label: How does the mobile charging machine work?
description: Simply place your phone inside the machine, and charging will start automatically. The system uses IoT to monitor and control charging securely.

label: Is my phone safe inside the charging machine?
description: Yes, the machine has a secure locking system and real-time monitoring to ensure the safety of your device.

label: How do I know if my phone is fully charged?
description: You can check the charging status on the machineâ€™s display or through the connected mobile app.

label: Can I stop charging before my phone is fully charged?
description: Yes, you can unlock the machine at any time using the provided authentication method (OTP, QR code, or mobile app).

label: Is the charging speed fast?
description: Yes, our machine supports fast charging for compatible devices. The speed depends on your phone model and battery health.

label: Does the machine support all phone models?
description: The machine is compatible with most smartphones that support USB Type-C, Micro-USB, or Lightning charging ports.

label: What if there is a power outage while my phone is charging?
description: The machine has a backup system to safely stop charging and keep your phone secure during a power failure.

label: How much does it cost to use the charging machine?
description: Pricing depends on the location and duration of charging. You can check the rates on the display or mobile app.
